problems_validated.problem: People lack a structured framework for understanding and developing mental toughness
problems_validated.severity: High - affects ability to maintain goal-aligned behavior during adversity
problems_validated.current_solutions: Generic advice about 'being tough' without clear definitions or measurable components
problems_validated.market_gap: No clear framework breaking down mental toughness into measurable, improvable components

business_strategies.strategy: Maintain consistent performance and delivery even during personal crises

problems_solutions.problem: Lack of structured approach to mental toughness development
problems_solutions.solution: Four-component mental toughness framework: Tolerance, Fortitude, Resilience, Adaptability

startup_ideas.idea: Mental toughness assessment and training platform

startup_ideas.problem_solved: Lack of measurable, structured approach to building mental resilience

startup_ideas.validation: High engagement on mental toughness content, comments showing demand for structured approach

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Believing mental toughness is binary (you have it or you don't)
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Prevents development and improvement of mental resilience skills
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Understand mental toughness exists on a continuum with four measurable components
mistakes_to_avoid.example: People thinking they're either 'tough' or 'weak' instead of developing specific skills

metrics_kpis.benchmark: How much hardship before behavior change occurs
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Monitor duration and intensity of stressors before behavioral deviation
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Gradually increase exposure to manageable stressors to build tolerance

metrics_kpis.benchmark: Time to return to baseline behavior after disruption
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Measure duration from behavioral change back to normal performance
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Develop specific recovery protocols and practice them regularly

trends_signals.trend: Increased demand for structured mental resilience frameworks
trends_signals.opportunity: Create measurable, scientific approaches to mental toughness development
